name: LiveWire Group, Inc.
description: LiveWire Group, Inc. is a prominent player in the electric motorcycle market, focused on creating innovative and sustainable electric vehicles. Established as a division of Harley-Davidson, LiveWire is dedicated to delivering high-performance electric motorcycles that combine the storied heritage of the Harley-Davidson brand with cutting-edge technology. The company’s flagship product, the LiveWire electric motorcycle, offers an exhilarating riding experience, featuring instant torque, advanced connectivity, and a state-of-the-art design. LiveWire aims to redefine the motorcycle experience by integrating smart technology, sustainability, and performance. As the electric vehicle landscape evolves, LiveWire is committed to expanding its product line to include a range of electric bikes that cater to various riding styles and preferences. The company’s focus extends beyond just vehicles; it is actively involved in building a community of electric motorcycle enthusiasts and promoting the benefits of electric mobility. LiveWire is positioned to capitalize on the growing demand for sustainable transportation solutions, with a mission to inspire a new generation of riders towards a cleaner and more exciting future.

seo.meta_title: LiveWire Group, Inc. | Electric Motorcycle Innovators
seo.meta_description: Explore LiveWire Group, Inc., the leading electric motorcycle company committed to sustainable mobility and high-performance electric vehicles.

faq.question: What does LiveWire specialize in?
faq.answer: LiveWire specializes in electric motorcycles and sustainable mobility solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of LiveWire?
faq.answer: Jochen Zeitz is the CEO of LiveWire Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is LiveWire headquartered?
faq.answer: LiveWire is headquartered in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, USA.

faq.question: What is LiveWire's main product?
faq.answer: LiveWire's main product is the LiveWire One electric motorcycle.
